trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Представляет информацию о <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Можно получить идентификационные сведения для распознавания инициализированный обработчик с помощью <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>для <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>объекта или <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>для <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>объекта.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of RecognizerInfo obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Сведения, возвращаемые в экземплярах RecognizerInfo, полученный от <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, определяется параметрами в **свойства речи** членом **панели управления**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of RecognizerInfo to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Для построения определенной конфигурации можно использовать экземпляры RecognizerInfo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>с помощью <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29>конструктор.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as RecognizerInfo instances.
trans-unit.target: Статический метод <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>возвращает список всех доступных <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>конфигураций как экземпляры RecognizerInfo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает дополнительные сведения <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> containing information about the configuration of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает экземпляр класса <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> содержащий сведения о конфигурации <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> объекта.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает язык и региональные параметры, поддерживаемые <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>объект может включать имя языка и региональных параметров, соответствующего языка, страны или региона, используемый календарь и формате дат и сортировке строк.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the culture supported by a given <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает сведения о язык и региональные параметры, поддерживаемые данной <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает описание <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that describes the configuration for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> , описывающий конфигурации для конкретного <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the `RecognizerInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Удаляет `RecognizerInfo` объекта.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает идентификатор <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the Id property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Идентификатор, возвращенная свойством идентификатор совпадает имя маркера механизма распознавания в реестре Windows.

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает идентификатор для конкретного <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает понятное имя <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Returns the friendly name for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает понятное имя для конкретной <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает аудио форматах, поддерживаемых <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает список аудио форматы, поддерживаемые конкретным классом <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> экземпляра.
